name: abridge-bundle
description: Abridge - set PWA cache files list, bundle and minify js
author: Jake G <106644+Jieiku@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.build: zola build && npm run abridge && zola build
scripts.serve: zola build && npm run abridge && zola serve
scripts.tinysearch: mkdir -p tmp && tinysearch --optimize --path tmp public/data_tinysearch/index.html && rsync -avz tmp/*.wasm static/ && rm -rf tmp
